(Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], No Effect on Mindless [mind], Affects Enemies Only [friendlyimmune], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune])
The victim is cursed with the form of a frog for the rest of his life.
